title: Oat and Walnut Cookies
ingredients: ['100g margarine', '125g dark brown soft sugar', '100g caster sugar', '1 egg', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '100g plain flour', '1/2 teaspoon baking powder', '1/8 teaspoon salt', '4 tablespoons chopped walnuts', '30g corn flakes cereal', '80g porridge oats']
